com.imagero.uio.bio
Class ByteArrayRandomAccessIO

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      com.imagero.uio.impl.AbstractRandomAccessInput
          com.imagero.uio.impl.AbstractRandomAccessIO
              com.imagero.uio.bio.ByteArrayRandomAccessIO
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.DataInput, java.io.DataOutput, Endian, Input, RandomAccessInput, RandomAccessIO, RandomAccessOutput, Seekable
public class ByteArrayRandomAccessIO
extends AbstractRandomAccessIO
implements RandomAccessIO

ByteArrayRandomAccessIO is like ByteArrayOutputStream and ByteArrayInputStream together. It implements also DataInput/DataOutput and other advanced interfaces.
